name: Vegan Thai Pizza with Gluten-free Crust
description: This Vegan Thai Pizza is super easy to put together & a crowd pleaser. Peanut butter sauce, carrots, onions, bell peppers, Sprouts. Gluten-free Crust Recipe. Makes a 9 or 10 inch pan pizza
recipeIngredient: Mung Bean Sprouts (home sprouted or store bought or other sprouts)
salt (pepper, lemon juice, cilantro and scallions for garnish)
For the Gluten-free Crust (or use any of my regular crusts)

recipeInstructions.text: Make the crust: Instructions below for the gluten-free crust
recipeInstructions.name: Make the crust: Instructions below for the gluten-free crust

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients for the crust and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl whisk all the dry ingredients for the crust and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In another bowl, combine water, yeast and sugar and let it sit until frothy. about 5 minutes. Add the flax seed meal and mix in. Let it sit for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: In another bowl, combine water, yeast and sugar and let it sit until frothy. about 5 minutes. Add the flax seed meal and mix in. Let it sit for a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dry to the wet. Add in the yogurt and oil and mix well. Let the sticky dough sit for 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dry to the wet. Add in the yogurt and oil and mix well. Let the sticky dough sit for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Using flour or oil on your hands shape the dough into a flat ball. Place ball on parchment lined pie pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Using flour or oil on your hands shape the dough into a flat ball. Place ball on parchment lined pie pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water or oil, press with your hands and shape the dough to fit the pan with atleast 1/2 inch edge going up the sides. You can also use flour and roll the dough out between parchment sheets and then place in the pie pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water or oil, press with your hands and shape the dough to fit the pan with atleast 1/2 inch edge going up the sides. You can also use flour and roll the dough out between parchment sheets and then place in the pie pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Even out the edges and let it sit for 15 minutes in a warm place. I usually put it near the oven when the over pre-heats.
recipeInstructions.name: Even out the edges and let it sit for 15 minutes in a warm place. I usually put it near the oven when the over pre-heats.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F / 200ºc.

recipeInstructions.text: Place another parchment on top of the pie pan. Bake for 10 minutes. Prep the veggies and peanut butter sauce.
recipeInstructions.name: Place another parchment on top of the pie pan. Bake for 10 minutes. Prep the veggies and peanut butter sauce.

recipeInstructions.text: Uncover and remove the pie pan from the oven. Pour the peanut sauce on the crust. Reserve a tablespoon or two sauce for garnish before serving. Layer the onions, bell peppers, crushed peanuts, carrots, jalapenos.
recipeInstructions.name: Uncover and remove the pie pan from the oven. Pour the peanut sauce on the crust. Reserve a tablespoon or two sauce for garnish before serving. Layer the onions, bell peppers, crushed peanuts, carrots, jalapenos.

recipeInstructions.text: Layer the sprouts, salt, pepper, lemon juice and vegan cheese shreds. Spray water on the crust edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Layer the sprouts, salt, pepper, lemon juice and vegan cheese shreds. Spray water on the crust edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 14 minutes. Broil for 1 to 2 minutes to brown the edges.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 14 minutes. Broil for 1 to 2 minutes to brown the edges.

recipeInstructions.text: Take the pizza out, Let it sit for 2 minutes before removing from parchment.
recipeInstructions.name: Take the pizza out, Let it sit for 2 minutes before removing from parchment.

recipeInstructions.text: Drizzle with the remaining peanut sauce. Garnish with pepper flakes, cilantro and scallions.
recipeInstructions.name: Drizzle with the remaining peanut sauce. Garnish with pepper flakes, cilantro and scallions.
